landing.title: A console, 20 years of games, 35 years of technology
landing.sub_title: With the RetroBox, play your favorite retro games in a simple and accessible way

about.title: Simplicity, Nostalgia, Sharing ...
about.description: The Retrobox is not a simple console, it is a way of sharing with your loved ones. Relive the moments of your childhood, your adolescence or even parents supervising their child.

game.title: An exceptional library
game.description: More than 25,000 free games available for free, discover more than 25,000 installable games in just a few clicks thanks to our library

custom.title: A customizable thing
custom.description: Have you ever wanted to have a unique console? With the purchase choose the console which corresponds to you without supplements!

connected.title: A connected console
connected.description: A connected console, view the status of your console remotely and control it down to the smallest detail (even from your smartphone)

switch.title: A flexible console
switch.description: A maximum of possibility, push further the principle of the portable console, connect it to your TV and play without problem in your sofa from your smartphone)

easy.title: A easly handling console
easy.description: Do not take the lead with the setup, all has been prepared for you!

opensource.title: An opensource console
opensource.description: This console is opensource, which means you can see the sources of the website, the diagrams etc. for no surprises

kited.title: Kit version
kited.description: You like electronics, build your own console with this version and customize it!

non_kited.title: Assembled version
non_kited.description: Start the adventure directly, without worrying about the technical side!
